main event: A civilian observer reported seeing an unidentified circular, bright light descending in Pottstown, Pennsylvania on November 7, 1967.
interesting points: The object was visible for approximately 10-15 seconds before it disappeared., The observer described the object as having sharp edges and moved up and down., It was reported to be hovering over a house at one point., No sound or vapor trails were detected during the sighting., The weather conditions included fog and light rain, and the sky was partly cloudy at night.
